AutoUpdateCheckPeriodMinutes.Name: AutoUpdateCheckPeriodMinutes
AutoUpdateCheckPeriodMinutes.ShortDescription: 自动更新检查时段替代
AutoUpdateCheckPeriodMinutes.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.2.145.5 及更高版本
AutoUpdateCheckPeriodMinutes.Description:
Minimum number of minutes between automatic update checks.

Set this policy to the value 0 to disable all periodic network traffic by Microsoft Edge Update. This is not recommended, as it prevents Microsoft Edge Update itself from receiving stability and security updates.

The 'Update policy override default' and per-application 'Update policy override' settings should be used to manage application updates rather than this setting.

The values for this policy can range from 0 to 43200.

UpdatesSuppressedStartHour.Name: UpdatesSuppressedStartHour
UpdatesSuppressedStartHour.ShortDescription: 每天中取消自动更新检查的时间段
UpdatesSuppressedStartHour.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.33.5 及更高版本
UpdatesSuppressedStartHour.Description:
If you enable this policy, update checks are suppressed each day starting at Hour:Minute for a period of Duration (in minutes). Duration isn't affected by daylight saving time. For example, if the start time is 22:00 and the duration is 480 minutes, updates will be suppressed for exactly 8 hours, regardless of whether daylight saving time starts or ends during this period.

If you disable or don't configure this policy, update checks aren't suppressed during any specific period.

The values for this policy can range from 0 to 23 for hours, 0 to 59 for minutes and 0 to 960 for duration in minutes.

ProxyMode.Name: ProxyMode
ProxyMode.ShortDescription: 选择如何指定代理服务器设置
ProxyMode.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.21.81 及更高版本
ProxyMode.Description:
允许你指定 Microsoft Edge 更新所使用的代理服务器设置。

如果启用此策略，则可以选择以下代理服务器选项之一：

- 如果选择从不使用代理服务器并且始终直接连接，则将忽略所有其他选项。
- 如果选择使用系统代理设置或自动检测代理服务器，则会忽略所有其他选项。
- 如果选择“固定服务器代理”模式，则可以在 '代理服务器的地址或 URL' 策略中指定更多选项。
- 如果选择使用 pac 代理脚本，则必须在 '代理 .pac 文件的 URL' 策略中指定脚本的 URL。

如果启用此策略，则组织中的用户无法在 Microsoft Edge 更新中更改代理设置。

如果禁用或未配置此策略，则不会配置任何代理服务器设置，但组织中的用户可以为 Microsoft Edge 更新选择自己的代理设置。

DataOptions.Name: 使用固定的代理服务器

ProxyServer.Name: ProxyServer
ProxyServer.ShortDescription: 代理服务器的地址或 URL
ProxyServer.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.21.81 及更高版本
ProxyServer.Description:
允许指定供 Microsoft Edge 更新使用的代理服务器的URL。

如果启用此策略，则可以设置组织中的 Microsoft Edge 更新所使用的代理服务器 URL。

仅当你在 "选择如何指定代理服务器设置" 策略中选择了手动代理设置时，才会应用此策略。

如果在 "选择如何指定代理服务器设置" 策略中选择了“手动”之外的代理设置，则不要配置此策略。

ProxyPacUrl.Name: ProxyPacUrl
ProxyPacUrl.ShortDescription: 指向代理 .pac 文件的 URL
ProxyPacUrl.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.21.81 及更高版本
ProxyPacUrl.Description:
允许指定代理自动配置（PAC）文件的 URL。

如果启用此策略，则可以为PAC文件指定一个URL，以自动执行 Microsoft Edge 更新如何选择适当的代理服务器来提取特定网站。

仅当已在 "选择如何指定代理服务器设置" 策略中指定手动代理设置时，才会应用此策略。

如果在 "选择如何指定代理服务器设置" 策略中选择了“手动”之外的代理设置，则不需要配置此策略。

InstallDefault.Name: InstallDefault
InstallDefault.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.2.145.5 及更高版本
InstallDefault.Description:
You can specify the default behavior of all channels to allow or block Microsoft Edge on domain-joined devices.

You can override this policy for individual channels by enabling (1) the '允许安装' policy for specific channels.

If you disable (2) this policy, the installation of Microsoft Edge is blocked. This only affects the installation of Microsoft Edge software when the '允许安装' policy is set to Not Configured.

This policy doesn't prevent Microsoft Edge Update from running or prevent users from installing Microsoft Edge software using other methods.

This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft® Active Directory® domain.

UpdateDefault.Name: UpdateDefault
UpdateDefault.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.2.145.5 及更高版本
UpdateDefault.Description:
Lets you specify the default behavior for all channels concerning the way Microsoft Edge Update handles available updates for Microsoft Edge. Can be overridden for individual channels by specifying the '更新策略替代' policy for those specific channels.

If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Update handles Microsoft Edge updates according to how you configure the following options:

- Updates disabled (0): Updates are never applied.
- Always allow updates (1) (recommended): Updates are always applied when found, either by periodic update check or by a manual update check.
- Manual updates only (2): Updates are applied only when the user runs a manual update check.
- Automatic silent updates only (3): Updates are applied only when they're found by the periodic update check.

If you select manual updates, make sure you periodically check for updates by using the app's manual update mechanism, if available. If you disable updates, periodically check for updates, and distribute them to users.

If you don't enable and configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Update handles available updates as specified by the '更新策略替代' policy.

This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft® Active Directory® domain.

Allowsxs.Name: Allowsxs
Allowsxs.ShortDescription: 允许 Microsoft Edge 并行浏览器体验
Allowsxs.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.2.145.5 及更高版本
Allowsxs.Description:
This policy lets a user run Microsoft Edge (Edge HTML) and Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) side-by-side.

If this policy is set to “Not configured”, Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) will replace Microsoft Edge (Edge HTML) after the Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) stable channel and the November 2019 security updates are installed.  This is the same behavior as the “Disabled” setting.

The “Disabled” (0) setting blocks a side-by-side experience and Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) will replace Microsoft Edge (Edge HTML) after the Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) stable channel and the November 2019 security updates are installed.  This is the same behavior as the “Not Configured” setting.

When this policy is “Enabled” (1), Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) and Microsoft Edge (Edge HTML) can run side-by-side after Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) is installed.

For this group policy to take affect, it must be configured before the automatic install of Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) by Windows Update. Note: ​A user can block the automatic update of Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) by using the Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) Blocker Toolkit.

Starting with Windows 10 version 20H2 Microsoft Edge Legacy and the side-by-side browser experience are not supported.

CreateDesktopShortcutDefault.Name: CreateDesktopShortcutDefault
CreateDesktopShortcutDefault.ShortDescription: 默认在安装时创建桌面快捷方式
CreateDesktopShortcutDefault.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.128.0 及更高版本
CreateDesktopShortcutDefault.Description:
Lets you specify the default behavior for all channels for creating a desktop shortcut when Microsoft Edge is installed.

If you enable (1) this policy a desktop shortcut is created when Microsoft Edge is installed.
If you disable (0) this policy, no desktop shortcut will be created when Microsoft Edge is installed.
If you don’t configure this policy a desktop shortcut to Microsoft Edge will be created during installation.
If Microsoft Edge is already installed, this policy will have no effect.

MeteredUpdatesDefault.Name: MeteredUpdatesDefault
MeteredUpdatesDefault.ShortDescription: 允许用户在按流量计费的连接上更新所有应用
MeteredUpdatesDefault.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.179.5 及更高版本
MeteredUpdatesDefault.Description:
Specifies whether Microsoft Edge Update will update on connections marked as metered, such as cellular connections or others where data usage is controlled for all apps.

If you don't enable and configure this policy, updates occur based the 'Download Updates over metered connections' toggle in the About Page of the Microsoft Edge browser. If a user doesn't make a choice, the Windows setting is used. You can find out more about the Windows setting here: [https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/client-management/mdm/policy-csp-update#allowautowindowsupdatedownloadovermeterednetwork](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/client-management/mdm/policy-csp-update#allowautowindowsupdatedownloadovermeterednetwork)

Always allow updates (2): Updates are always downloaded when found, either by automatic update check or by a manual update check.

Updates disabled (1): Updates are not downloaded when using a metered connection.

DataOptions.Name: 默认按流量计费的更新已禁用
允许的默认按流量计费的更新

RemoveDesktopShortcutDefault.Name: RemoveDesktopShortcutDefault
RemoveDesktopShortcutDefault.ShortDescription: 默认更新时删除桌面快捷方式
RemoveDesktopShortcutDefault.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.155.1 及更高版本
RemoveDesktopShortcutDefault.Description:
Lets you specify the default behavior for all channels for creating a desktop shortcut when Microsoft Edge is installed.

If you set this policy to "Force delete system-level Desktop Shortcuts" (1), any existing system-level Microsoft Edge desktop shortcuts will be deleted when the browser updates or the machine reboots.
If you set this policy to "Force delete system-level and user-level Desktop Shortcuts" (2), any existing system-level Microsoft Edge desktop shortcuts will be deleted when the browser updates or the machine reboots and any existing user-level desktop shortcuts will be deleted when the browser updates. This includes user-level desktop shortcuts that users might have made themselves.
If you don't configure this policy or disable it (0), nothing will happen to existing Microsoft Edge desktop shortcuts.

DataOptions.Name: 强制删除系统级桌面快捷方式
强制删除系统级和用户级桌面快捷方式
安装时禁止创建桌面快捷方式

UpdaterExperimentationAndConfigurationSe.Name: UpdaterExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl
UpdaterExperimentationAndConfigurationSe.ShortDescription: 控制更新程序与试验和配置服务的通信
UpdaterExperimentationAndConfigurationSe.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.145.1 及更高版本
UpdaterExperimentationAndConfigurationSe.Description:
In Microsoft Edge Update, the Experimentation and Configuration Service is used to deploy experimentation payload.

Experimentation payload consists of a list of early in development features that Microsoft is enabling for testing and feedback.

If you enable (1) this policy, experimentation payload is downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.

If you disable (0) this policy, communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service is stopped completely.

If you don't configure this policy, on a managed device the behavior is same as policy 'disabled'.

If you don't configure this policy, on an unmanaged device the behavior is same as policy 'enabled'.

DataOptions.Name: 禁止与试验和配置服务通信

Install{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97FE7E.Name: Install{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97FE7E9062}
Install{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97FE7E.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.2.145.5 及更高版本
Install{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97FE7E.Description:
Specifies whether a Microsoft Edge channel can be installed on domain-joined devices.

If you enable (1) this policy for a channel, Microsoft Edge will not be blocked from installation.

If you disable (0) this policy for a channel (or set it to 'Installs disabled'), Microsoft Edge will be blocked from installation.

If you don't configure this policy for a channel, the '默认允许安装' policy configuration determines whether users can install that channel of Microsoft Edge.

If you set this policy to Always allow Machine-Wide Installs but not Per-User Installs (4), Microsoft Edge will only be deployed machine-wide.

If you set this policy to Force Installs (Machine-Wide) (5), Microsoft Edge may only be deployed machine-wide if Microsoft Edge Update is pre-installed. Requires Microsoft Edge Update 1.3.155.43 or higher.

If you set this policy to Force Installs (Per-User) (6), Microsoft Edge may only be deployed on a Per-User basis to all machines if Microsoft Edge Update is pre-installed Per-User. Requires Microsoft Edge Update 1.3.155.43 or higher.

此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft® Active Directory® 域的 Windows 实例。

DataOptions.Name: 始终允许Machine-Wide安装，但不允许Per-User安装

Update{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97FE7E9.Name: Update{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97FE7E9062}
Update{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97FE7E9.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.2.145.5 及更高版本
Update{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97FE7E9.Description:
Specifies how Microsoft Edge Update handles available updates from Microsoft Edge.

If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Update handles Microsoft Edge updates according to how you configure the following options:

- Updates disabled (0): Updates are never applied.
- Always allow updates (1) (Recommended): Updates are always applied when found, either by periodic update check or by a manual update check.
- Manual updates only (2): Updates are applied only when the user runs a manual update check. (Not all apps provide an interface for this option.)
- Automatic silent updates only (3): Updates are applied only when they're found by the periodic update check.

If you select manual updates, make sure you periodically check for updates by using the app's manual update mechanism, if available. If you disable updates, periodically check for updates, and distribute them to users.

If you don't enable and configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Update handles available updates as specified by the '更新策略替代默认值' policy.

See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2136406](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2136406) for more information.

This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft® Active Directory® domain.

CreateDesktopShortcut{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD.Name: CreateDesktopShortcut{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97FE7E9062}
CreateDesktopShortcut{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD.ShortDescription: 在安装时创建桌面快捷方式
CreateDesktopShortcut{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.128.0 及更高版本
CreateDesktopShortcut{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD.Description:
If you enable (1) this policy a desktop shortcut is created when Microsoft Edge is installed.
If you disable (0) this policy, no desktop shortcut will be created when Microsoft Edge is installed.
If you don’t configure this policy a desktop shortcut to Microsoft Edge will be created during installation.
If Microsoft Edge is already installed, this policy will have no effect.

If you don't configure this policy for a channel, the '默认在安装时创建桌面快捷方式' policy configuration determines shortcut creation when Microsoft Edge is installed.

RemoveDesktopShortcut{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD.Name: RemoveDesktopShortcut{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97FE7E9062}
RemoveDesktopShortcut{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD.ShortDescription: 更新时删除桌面快捷方式
RemoveDesktopShortcut{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.155.1 及更高版本
RemoveDesktopShortcut{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD.Description:
If you set this policy to "Force delete system-level Desktop Shortcuts" (1), any existing system-level Microsoft Edge desktop shortcuts will be deleted when the browser updates or the machine reboots.
If you set this policy to "Force delete system-level and user-level Desktop Shortcuts" (2), any existing system-level Microsoft Edge desktop shortcuts will be deleted when the browser updates or the machine reboots and any existing user-level desktop shortcuts will be deleted when the browser updates. This includes user-level desktop shortcuts that users might have made themselves.
If you don't configure this policy or disable it (0), nothing will happen to existing Microsoft Edge desktop shortcuts.

If you don't configure this policy for a channel, the '默认更新时删除桌面快捷方式' policy configuration determines desktop shortcut removal.

DataOptions.Name: 强制删除系统级桌面快捷方式
强制删除系统级和用户级桌面快捷方式
安装时禁止创建桌面快捷方式

TargetVersionPrefix{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B.Name: TargetVersionPrefix{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97FE7E9062}
TargetVersionPrefix{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.119.43 及更高版本
TargetVersionPrefix{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B.Description:
如果启用此策略和自动更新，则 Microsoft Edge 将会更新至此策略值指定的版本。

策略值必须为特定 Microsoft Edge 版本，如 83.0.499.12。

如果设备安装了比指定值更新的 Microsoft Edge 版本，则 Microsoft Edge 将继续沿用较新版本，不会降级为指定版本。

如果指定版本不存在，或者格式不正确，则 Microsoft Edge 将继续沿用其当前版本，并且不会自动更新至未来的版本。

有关详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2136707](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2136707)。

此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft® Active Directory® 域的 Windows 实例。

RollbackToTargetVersion{56EB18F8-B008-4C.Name: RollbackToTargetVersion{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97FE7E9062}
RollbackToTargetVersion{56EB18F8-B008-4C.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.133.3 及更高版本
RollbackToTargetVersion{56EB18F8-B008-4C.Description:
Specifies that Microsoft Edge Update should rollback installations of Microsoft Edge to the version indicated in '目标版本覆盖'.

This policy has no effect unless '目标版本覆盖' is set and '更新策略替代' is set to one of the ON states (Always allow updates, Automatic silent updates only, Manual updates only).

If you disable (0) this policy or don't configure it, installs that have a version higher than that specified by '目标版本覆盖' will be left as-is.

If you enable (1) this policy, installs that have a current version higher than specified by the '目标版本覆盖' will be downgraded to the target version.

We recommend that users install the latest version of the Microsoft Edge browser to ensure protection by the latest security updates. Rollback to an earlier version risks exposure to known security issues. This policy is meant to be used as a temporary fix to address issues in a Microsoft Edge browser update.

Before temporarily rolling back your browser version, we recommend that you turn on Sync ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133032](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133032)) for all users in your organization. If you don't turn on Sync, there is a risk of permanent browsing data loss. Use this policy at your own risk.

Note: All versions available for rollback can be viewed here [https://aka.ms/EdgeEnterprise](https://aka.ms/EdgeEnterprise).

This policy applies to Microsoft Edge version 86 or later.

See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133918](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133918) for more information.

This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft® Active Directory® domain.

MeteredUpdates{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8.Name: MeteredUpdates{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97FE7E9062}
MeteredUpdates{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8.ShortDescription: 允许用户更新按流量计费的连接
MeteredUpdates{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.179.5 及更高版本
MeteredUpdates{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8.Description:
Specifies whether Microsoft Edge Update will update on connections marked as metered, such as cellular connections or others where data usage is controlled for the Microsoft Edge browser.

If you don't enable and configure this policy, updates occur based the 'Download Updates over metered connections' toggle in the About Page of the Microsoft Edge browser. If a user doesn't make a choice, the Windows setting is used. You can find out more about the Windows setting here: [https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/client-management/mdm/policy-csp-update#allowautowindowsupdatedownloadovermeterednetwork](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/client-management/mdm/policy-csp-update#allowautowindowsupdatedownloadovermeterednetwork)

Always allow updates (2): Updates are always downloaded when found, either by automatic update check or by a manual update check.

Disable updates (1): Updates are not downloaded when using a metered connection.

DataOptions.Name: 按流量计费的禁用更新
允许按流量计费的更新

TargetChannel{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C.Name: TargetChannel{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97FE7E9062}
TargetChannel{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.147.1 及更高版本
TargetChannel{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C.Description:
Specifies which Channel Microsoft Edge should be updated to.

If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge will be updated to the Channel according to how you configure the following options:


- Stable: Microsoft Edge will be updated to the latest stable version.
- Beta: Microsoft Edge will be updated to the latest beta version.
- Dev: Microsoft Edge will be updated to the latest dev version.
- Extended Stable: Microsoft Edge will be updated to the latest extended stable version, which follows a longer release cadence than stable. For more information, visit [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2163508](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2163508).

If you do not configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will be updated to the latest version available for the default Channel.

This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft® Active Directory® domain.

EdgePreview{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97.Name: EdgePreview{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97FE7E9062}
EdgePreview{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97.ShortDescription: 允许 Windows Insider 计划中的用户加入 Edge 预览版
EdgePreview{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.168.21 及更高版本
EdgePreview{56EB18F8-B008-4CBD-B6D2-8C97.Description:
Lets you specify whether users in the Windows Insider Program are enrolled in Edge Preview via Microsoft Edge Update.


- If you enable (1) this policy, users in the Windows Insider Program are enrolled in Edge Preview via Microsoft Edge Update.

- If you disable (0) this policy, users in the Windows Insider Program cannot be enrolled in Edge Preview via Microsoft Edge Update.

- If you don't configure this policy, users in the Windows Insider Program are enrolled in Edge Preview via Microsoft Edge Update by default.

Install{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A2C8-9AF4EF3C.Name: Install{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A2C8-9AF4EF3C72AA}
Install{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A2C8-9AF4EF3C.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.2.145.5 及更高版本
Install{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A2C8-9AF4EF3C.Description:
Specifies whether a Microsoft Edge channel can be installed on domain-joined devices.

If you enable (1) this policy for a channel, Microsoft Edge will not be blocked from installation.

If you disable (0) this policy for a channel (or set it to 'Installs disabled'), Microsoft Edge will be blocked from installation.

If you don't configure this policy for a channel, the '默认允许安装' policy configuration determines whether users can install that channel of Microsoft Edge.

If you set this policy to Always allow Machine-Wide Installs but not Per-User Installs (4), Microsoft Edge Beta will only be deployed machine-wide.

If you set this policy to Force Installs (Machine-Wide) (5), Microsoft Edge Beta may only be deployed machine-wide if Microsoft Edge Update is pre-installed. Requires Microsoft Edge Update 1.3.155.43 or higher.

If you set this policy to Force Installs (Per-User) (6), Microsoft Edge Beta may only be deployed on a Per-User basis to all machines if Microsoft Edge Update is pre-installed Per-User. Requires Microsoft Edge Update 1.3.155.43 or higher.

此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft® Active Directory® 域的 Windows 实例。

DataOptions.Name: 始终允许Machine-Wide安装，但不允许Per-User安装

Update{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A2C8-9AF4EF3C7.Name: Update{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A2C8-9AF4EF3C72AA}
Update{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A2C8-9AF4EF3C7.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.2.145.5 及更高版本
Update{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A2C8-9AF4EF3C7.Description:
Specifies how Microsoft Edge Update handles available updates from Microsoft Edge.

If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Update handles Microsoft Edge updates according to how you configure the following options:

- Updates disabled (0): Updates are never applied.
- Always allow updates (1) (Recommended): Updates are always applied when found, either by periodic update check or by a manual update check.
- Manual updates only (2): Updates are applied only when the user runs a manual update check. (Not all apps provide an interface for this option.)
- Automatic silent updates only (3): Updates are applied only when they're found by the periodic update check.

If you select manual updates, make sure you periodically check for updates by using the app's manual update mechanism, if available. If you disable updates, periodically check for updates, and distribute them to users.

If you don't enable and configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Update handles available updates as specified by the '更新策略替代默认值' policy.

See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2136406](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2136406) for more information.

This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft® Active Directory® domain.

CreateDesktopShortcut{2CD8A007-E189-409D.Name: CreateDesktopShortcut{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A2C8-9AF4EF3C72AA}
CreateDesktopShortcut{2CD8A007-E189-409D.ShortDescription: 在安装时创建桌面快捷方式
CreateDesktopShortcut{2CD8A007-E189-409D.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.128.0 及更高版本
CreateDesktopShortcut{2CD8A007-E189-409D.Description:
If you enable (1) this policy a desktop shortcut is created when Microsoft Edge is installed.
If you disable (0) this policy, no desktop shortcut will be created when Microsoft Edge is installed.
If you don’t configure this policy a desktop shortcut to Microsoft Edge will be created during installation.
If Microsoft Edge is already installed, this policy will have no effect.

If you don't configure this policy for a channel, the '默认在安装时创建桌面快捷方式' policy configuration determines shortcut creation when Microsoft Edge is installed.

RemoveDesktopShortcut{2CD8A007-E189-409D.Name: RemoveDesktopShortcut{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A2C8-9AF4EF3C72AA}
RemoveDesktopShortcut{2CD8A007-E189-409D.ShortDescription: 更新时删除桌面快捷方式
RemoveDesktopShortcut{2CD8A007-E189-409D.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.155.1 及更高版本
RemoveDesktopShortcut{2CD8A007-E189-409D.Description:
If you set this policy to "Force delete system-level Desktop Shortcuts" (1), any existing system-level Microsoft Edge desktop shortcuts will be deleted when the browser updates or the machine reboots.
If you set this policy to "Force delete system-level and user-level Desktop Shortcuts" (2), any existing system-level Microsoft Edge desktop shortcuts will be deleted when the browser updates or the machine reboots and any existing user-level desktop shortcuts will be deleted when the browser updates. This includes user-level desktop shortcuts that users might have made themselves.
If you don't configure this policy or disable it (0), nothing will happen to existing Microsoft Edge desktop shortcuts.

If you don't configure this policy for a channel, the '默认更新时删除桌面快捷方式' policy configuration determines desktop shortcut removal.

DataOptions.Name: 强制删除系统级桌面快捷方式
强制删除系统级和用户级桌面快捷方式
安装时禁止创建桌面快捷方式

TargetVersionPrefix{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A.Name: TargetVersionPrefix{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A2C8-9AF4EF3C72AA}
TargetVersionPrefix{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.119.43 及更高版本
TargetVersionPrefix{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A.Description:
如果启用此策略和自动更新，则 Microsoft Edge 将会更新至此策略值指定的版本。

策略值必须为特定 Microsoft Edge 版本，如 83.0.499.12。

如果设备安装了比指定值更新的 Microsoft Edge 版本，则 Microsoft Edge 将继续沿用较新版本，不会降级为指定版本。

如果指定版本不存在，或者格式不正确，则 Microsoft Edge 将继续沿用其当前版本，并且不会自动更新至未来的版本。

有关详细信息，请参阅 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2136707](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2136707)。

此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft® Active Directory® 域的 Windows 实例。

RollbackToTargetVersion{2CD8A007-E189-40.Name: RollbackToTargetVersion{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A2C8-9AF4EF3C72AA}
RollbackToTargetVersion{2CD8A007-E189-40.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.133.3 及更高版本
RollbackToTargetVersion{2CD8A007-E189-40.Description:
Specifies that Microsoft Edge Update should rollback installations of Microsoft Edge to the version indicated in '目标版本覆盖'.

This policy has no effect unless '目标版本覆盖' is set and '更新策略替代' is set to one of the ON states (Always allow updates, Automatic silent updates only, Manual updates only).

If you disable (0) this policy or don't configure it, installs that have a version higher than that specified by '目标版本覆盖' will be left as-is.

If you enable (1) this policy, installs that have a current version higher than specified by the '目标版本覆盖' will be downgraded to the target version.

We recommend that users install the latest version of the Microsoft Edge browser to ensure protection by the latest security updates. Rollback to an earlier version risks exposure to known security issues. This policy is meant to be used as a temporary fix to address issues in a Microsoft Edge browser update.

Before temporarily rolling back your browser version, we recommend that you turn on Sync ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133032](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133032)) for all users in your organization. If you don't turn on Sync, there is a risk of permanent browsing data loss. Use this policy at your own risk.

Note: All versions available for rollback can be viewed here [https://aka.ms/EdgeEnterprise](https://aka.ms/EdgeEnterprise).

This policy applies to Microsoft Edge version 86 or later.

See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133918](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133918) for more information.

This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft® Active Directory® domain.

MeteredUpdates{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A2C8-9.Name: MeteredUpdates{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A2C8-9AF4EF3C72AA}
MeteredUpdates{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A2C8-9.ShortDescription: 允许用户更新按流量计费的连接
MeteredUpdates{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A2C8-9.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.179.5 及更高版本
MeteredUpdates{2CD8A007-E189-409D-A2C8-9.Description:
Specifies whether Microsoft Edge Update will update on connections marked as metered, such as cellular connections or others where data usage is controlled for the Microsoft Edge browser.

If you don't enable and configure this policy, updates occur based the 'Download Updates over metered connections' toggle in the About Page of the Microsoft Edge browser. If a user doesn't make a choice, the Windows setting is used. You can find out more about the Windows setting here: [https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/client-management/mdm/policy-csp-update#allowautowindowsupdatedownloadovermeterednetwork](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/client-management/mdm/policy-csp-update#allowautowindowsupdatedownloadovermeterednetwork)

Always allow updates (2): Updates are always downloaded when found, either by automatic update check or by a manual update check.

Disable updates (1): Updates are not downloaded when using a metered connection.

DataOptions.Name: 按流量计费的禁用更新
允许按流量计费的更新

Install{0D50BFEC-CD6A-4F9A-964C-C7416E3A.Name: Install{0D50BFEC-CD6A-4F9A-964C-C7416E3ACB10}
Install{0D50BFEC-CD6A-4F9A-964C-C7416E3A.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.2.145.5 及更高版本
Install{0D50BFEC-CD6A-4F9A-964C-C7416E3A.Description:
Specifies whether a Microsoft Edge channel can be installed on domain-joined devices.

If you enable (1) this policy for a channel, Microsoft Edge will not be blocked from installation.

If you disable (0) this policy for a channel (or set it to 'Installs disabled'), Microsoft Edge will be blocked from installation.

If you don't configure this policy for a channel, the '默认允许安装' policy configuration determines whether users can install that channel of Microsoft Edge.

If you set this policy to Always allow Machine-Wide Installs but not Per-User Installs (4), Microsoft Edge Dev will only be deployed machine-wide.

If you set this policy to Force Installs (Machine-Wide) (5), Microsoft Edge Dev may only be deployed machine-wide if Microsoft Edge Update is pre-installed. Requires Microsoft Edge Update 1.3.155.43 or higher.

If you set this policy to Force Installs (Per-User) (6), Microsoft Edge Dev may only be deployed on a Per-User basis to all machines if Microsoft Edge Update is pre-installed Per-User. Requires Microsoft Edge Update 1.3.155.43 or higher.

此策略仅适用于已加入 Microsoft® Active Directory® 域的 Windows 实例。

DataOptions.Name: 始终允许Machine-Wide安装，但不允许Per-User安装

Update{0D50BFEC-CD6A-4F9A-964C-C7416E3AC.Name: Update{0D50BFEC-CD6A-4F9A-964C-C7416E3ACB10}
Update{0D50BFEC-CD6A-4F9A-964C-C7416E3AC.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.2.145.5 及更高版本
Update{0D50BFEC-CD6A-4F9A-964C-C7416E3AC.Description:
Specifies how Microsoft Edge Update handles available updates from Microsoft Edge.

If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Update handles Microsoft Edge updates according to how you configure the following options:

- Updates disabled (0): Updates are never applied.
- Always allow updates (1) (Recommended): Updates are always applied when found, either by periodic update check or by a manual update check.
- Manual updates only (2): Updates are applied only when the user runs a manual update check. (Not all apps provide an interface for this option.)
- Automatic silent updates only (3): Updates are applied only when they're found by the periodic update check.

If you select manual updates, make sure you periodically check for updates by using the app's manual update mechanism, if available. If you disable updates, periodically check for updates, and distribute them to users.

If you don't enable and configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Update handles available updates as specified by the '更新策略替代默认值' policy.

See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2136406](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2136406) for more information.

This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft® Active Directory® domain.

CreateDesktopShortcut{0D50BFEC-CD6A-4F9A.Name: CreateDesktopShortcut{0D50BFEC-CD6A-4F9A-964C-C7416E3ACB10}
CreateDesktopShortcut{0D50BFEC-CD6A-4F9A.ShortDescription: 在安装时创建桌面快捷方式
CreateDesktopShortcut{0D50BFEC-CD6A-4F9A.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.128.0 及更高版本
CreateDesktopShortcut{0D50BFEC-CD6A-4F9A.Description:
If you enable (1) this policy a desktop shortcut is created when Microsoft Edge is installed.
If you disable (0) this policy, no desktop shortcut will be created when Microsoft Edge is installed.
If you don’t configure this policy a desktop shortcut to Microsoft Edge will be created during installation.
If Microsoft Edge is already installed, this policy will have no effect.

If you don't configure this policy for a channel, the '默认在安装时创建桌面快捷方式' policy configuration determines shortcut creation when Microsoft Edge is installed.

RemoveDesktopShortcut{0D50BFEC-CD6A-4F9A.Name: RemoveDesktopShortcut{0D50BFEC-CD6A-4F9A-964C-C7416E3ACB10}
RemoveDesktopShortcut{0D50BFEC-CD6A-4F9A.ShortDescription: 更新时删除桌面快捷方式
RemoveDesktopShortcut{0D50BFEC-CD6A-4F9A.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.155.1 及更高版本
RemoveDesktopShortcut{0D50BFEC-CD6A-4F9A.Description:
If you set this policy to "Force delete system-level Desktop Shortcuts" (1), any existing system-level Microsoft Edge desktop shortcuts will be deleted when the browser updates or the machine reboots.
If you set this policy to "Force delete system-level and user-level Desktop Shortcuts" (2), any existing system-level Microsoft Edge desktop shortcuts will be deleted when the browser updates or the machine reboots and any existing user-level desktop shortcuts will be deleted when the browser updates. This includes user-level desktop shortcuts that users might have made themselves.
If you don't configure this policy or disable it (0), nothing will happen to existing Microsoft Edge desktop shortcuts.

If you don't configure this policy for a channel, the '默认更新时删除桌面快捷方式' policy configuration determines desktop shortcut removal.

DataOptions.Name: 强制删除系统级桌面快捷方式
强制删除系统级和用户级桌面快捷方式
安装时禁止创建桌面快捷方式

Install{F3017226-FE2A-4295-8BDF-00C3A9A7.Name: Install{F3017226-FE2A-4295-8BDF-00C3A9A7E4C5}
Install{F3017226-FE2A-4295-8BDF-00C3A9A7.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.127.1 及更高版本
Install{F3017226-FE2A-4295-8BDF-00C3A9A7.Description:
Lets you specify whether the WebView2 Runtime can be installed using Microsoft Edge Update.

If you enable (1) this policy, users can install the WebView2 Runtime through Microsoft Edge Update.

If you disable (0) this policy (or set it to 'Installs disabled'), users cannot install the WebView2 Runtime through Microsoft Edge Update.

If you set this policy to Always allow Machine-Wide Installs but not Per-User Installs (4), the WebView2 Runtime will only be deployed machine-wide.

If you set the policy to Force Installs (Machine-Wide) (5), users can install the WebView2 Runtime to all machines where Microsoft Edge Update is pre-installed. Requires Microsoft Edge Update 1.3.155.43 or higher.

If you don't configure this policy, the WebView2 Runtime will be installed through Microsoft Edge Update.

DataOptions.Name: 始终允许Machine-Wide安装，但不允许Per-User安装

Update{F3017226-FE2A-4295-8BDF-00C3A9A7E.Name: Update{F3017226-FE2A-4295-8BDF-00C3A9A7E4C5}
Update{F3017226-FE2A-4295-8BDF-00C3A9A7E.SupportVersion: Microsoft Edge 更新 1.3.127.1 及更高版本
Update{F3017226-FE2A-4295-8BDF-00C3A9A7E.Description:
Lets you specify whether or not automatic updates are enabled for the WebView2 Runtime. The WebView2 Runtime is a component used by applications to display web content.
Automatic updates are enabled by default. Disabling automatic updates for the WebView2 Runtime might cause compatibility issues with applications that depend on this component.

If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Update handles the WebView2 Runtime updates according to how you configure the following options:

- Always allow updates (1): Updates are automatically downloaded and applied
- Updates disabled (0): Updates are never downloaded or applied

If you don't enable this policy, updates are automatically downloaded and applied.
